name: Electronic bazaar
overview:
“Need is the mother of invention” Every second a new technology hits the electronics market. But how many of us are aware of such new inventions. The answer to this question is through ELECTRONIC BAZAAR.

ELECTRONIC BAZAAR provide an online shopping platform to our customers wherein gamuts of electronic gadgets are available at competitive prices. Our vast range of electronics includes Laptops Cameras, mobiles, Camcorders, Digital photo frames, Blue-tooth devices and other electronics accessories. We believe that “customer is the king” and we subsist because of our valuable customers. ELECTRONIC BAZAAR work to make their customers e- shopping experience simpler, pleasurable and entirely secure. We are here to satisfy our customer needs before and after their purchase.

You can contact us:- Address:- Electronic Bazaar PO Box -6110, ST KILDA RD CENTRAL, VIC 8008 Email: sales@electronicbazaar.com.au Phone: 03 9016 3949
